mapper.sql: id, company_id, user_id, status, creator, created, customer_manager, grade,source,community,city_area_id,address,remarks,sex
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_customer(id, company_id, user_id, status, creator, created, customer_manager, grade,source,community,city_area_id,address,remarks,name,phone,sex) VALUES(#{id}, #{companyId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{created}, #{customerManager}, #{grade},#{source},#{community},#{cityAreaId},#{address},#{remarks},#{name},#{phone},#{sex})
mapper.update:
UPDATE company_customer
company_id = #{companyId},
user_id = #{userId},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
created = #{created},
customer_manager = #{customerManager},
grade = #{grade},
source = #{source},
community = #{community},
city_area_id = #{cityAreaId},
address = #{address},
remarks = #{remarks},
name = #{name},
phone = #{phone},
sex = #{sex}
WHERE id = #{id}
update company_customer set status=3 where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select from company_customer where user_id=#{userId} and company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT a.company_id,a.user_id,a.status,a.creator,a.created,a.customer_manager, a.grade,a.community,a.source,a.city_area_id cityAreaId, u.sex,u.name userName,u.contact_number mobile,u.state,u.address,u.work ,u.workUnit,a.mergerName,a.salesmanMobile,a.salesmanName,u.birthday,a.avatar,u.login_name loginName,a.remarks FROM (SELECT cc.* ,u.mobile salesmanMobile,u.name salesmanName ,u.avatar from (SELECT cc.*,ci.merger_name mergerName from company_customer cc LEFT JOIN city_area ci on cc.city_area_id=ci.id) cc LEFT JOIN user u on cc.customer_manager=u.id )a LEFT JOIN (select u.* ,us.contact_number ,us.address,us.work,us.work_unit workUnit from user u left join user_basis us on u.id=us.user_id )u on a.user_id=u.id where a.company_id=#{companyId} and a.user_id=#{userId}
select count(*) from company_customer

SELECT c.source customerSource,u.name customerName,ca.merger_name customerMergerName,c.address customerAddress,c.user_id userId,c.id customerId from (SELECT id,user_id,source,city_area_id caId ,address from company_customer where to_days(created) = to_days(now()) )c LEFT JOIN user u on c.user_id=u.id LEFT JOIN city_area ca on ca.id = c.caId
select count(*) from company_customer where DATE_FORMAT(created,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
select count(*) from company_customer where PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),'%Y%m'),date_format(created,'%Y%m'))=1
select DATE_FORMAT(created,'%Y-%m') as creatTime ,count(*) count from company_customer where YEAR(created)=YEAR(NOW()) group by creatTime
SELECT from company_customer where company_id=#{companyId}
SELECT c.name companyName from company_customer cc left join company c on cc.company_id=c.id where cc.user_id=#{customerId}

SELECT c.companyId,c.created,c.customerId,c.source customerSource,u.name customerName,ca.merger_name customerMergerName,c.address customerAddress,u.id userId from (SELECT id customerId,company_id companyId,user_id,source,city_area_id caId ,address,created from company_customer
city_area_id in (SELECT id from city_area where merger_name like '%${mergerName}%')
and user_id in (SELECT id from user WHERE name like '%${condition}%' or mobile like '%${condition}%' )
and source=#{source}
and company_id in (select id from company where name like '%${dealerName}%')
and user_id in (select customer_id from custom_order where no like '%${orderNo}%')
and to_days(created) = to_days(now())
and DATE_FORMAT( created, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )
)c LEFT JOIN user u on c.user_id=u.id LEFT JOIN city_area ca on ca.id = c.caId

select u.id as customerId,u.name as customerName, substring(ca.merger_name,4) as cityName,cc.address,u.mobile from company_customer cc left join user u on u.id = cc.user_id left join city_area ca on ca.id = cc.city_area_id where cc.company_id = #{companyId}
select cc.* from company_customer cc where cc.company_id = #{companyId} and cc.phone=#{mobile}

select cc.name as customer_name,cc.phone as customer_mobile, cc.sex,ca.id cityId, cc.community,cc.remarks,cc.id, co.name company_name, us.name as sale_man,us.mobile as sale_man_mobile, substring(ca.merger_name,4) as customer_merger_name,cc.address as customer_address from company_customer cc left join company co on cc.company_id = co.id left join user us on cc.customer_manager=us.id left join city_area ca on ca.id = cc.city_area_id where cc.id = #{id}

select cc.*, c.name as companyName,c.leader_tel as leaderTel,c.id as companyId,ca.merger_name as cityAreaName ,u.name customerManagerName from company_customer cc left join company c on c.id = cc.company_id left join city_area ca on ca.id = cc.city_area_id left join company_employee ce on ce.id = cc.customer_manager left join user u on ce.user_id = u.id where cc.id = #{userId} limit 1
select from company_customer where phone = #{mobile}

select cc.*, c.name as companyName,c.leader_tel as leaderTel,c.id as companyId,ca.merger_name as cityAreaName ,u.name customerManagerName, ca1.id cityId,ca1.parent_id provinceId from company_customer cc left join company c on c.id = cc.company_id left join city_area ca on ca.id = cc.city_area_id left join company_employee ce on ce.id = cc.customer_manager left join user u on ce.user_id = u.id left join city_area ca1 on ca.parent_id = ca1.id where cc.id = #{id}

select (select count(*) from company_customer where company_id in(select id from company where branch_id=#{branchId}) and DATE_FORMAT(created,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m'))as monthNum, (select count(*) from company_customer where company_id in(select id from company where branch_id=#{branchId}) and YEARWEEK(date_format(created,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()))as weekNum, (select count(*) from company_customer where company_id in(select id from company where branch_id=#{branchId}) and DATE_FORMAT(created,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'))as todayNum
